description: 3 level 1/2 duplex with above ground 1 bedroom suite! Main floor enjoys Primary bedroom with walk-in closet and tiled ensuite, modern kitchen with sleek flat panel cabinetry, quartz countertops, centre island, spacious great room area with stunning fireplace! Top floor provides 2 bedrooms , full bathroom and laundry. Basement is fully finished with bedroom, bathroom, laundry, kitchen and living room! 2 car garage , heat pump, long life metal roof, better choice than a townhome with no bylaws, rules or strata fees, call today!
